alert.note: Alert for Henry; Jefferson; Keokuk; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 29 at 9:33AM CDT until August 29 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 AM CDT FOR WESTERN HENRY...SOUTHEASTERN KEOKUK...SOUTHERN WASHINGTON AND JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 933 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Marr Park to near Fairfield, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Ainsworth, Haskins and Marr Park around 940 AM CDT. Rome around 945 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Wayland, Coppock, Trenton, Olds, Swedesburg, Noble and Crawfordsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
